text: Sano aŵala ŵatwapele chitabu (mpela Abdullah bin Salâm ni Ayuda ŵane ŵaasingwiche) akuisengwela ayila yaitulusyidwe kukwenu (jajili Qur’an), nambo m’mikutula jine (jamakafili) mwana ŵaakuikana ine mwa yalakweyo. Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Chisimu une namulidwe kuti nan’galagatileje Allah ni ngawwanganyaga Jwalakwe (ni chilichose). Kukwakwe nguŵilanjila, soni Kukwakwe nikwakuujila kwangu.”
